A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
As a long time Star Wars fan\, this film has left a bitter taste - it's apparent that the director and writers don't understand and didn't take the time or effort to respect the original trilogy characters\, the lore\, or the themes of the original films.

I'm all for taking Star Wars boldly into a new era with new characters\, but the way it's been handled is very poor.

Too many plot holes\, too much forced humour which was notably out of place\, bad writing\, worse character progression and a complete mishandling of cherished characters\, I'll give the movie 1 star for the visuals\, but that's as much as it deserves.
